It's official! Sabrina the Teenage Witch is back at it again and this time, she's going DARK. Netflix has ordered two ten - episode seasons of the stand - alone Riverdale companion show which will be based on the Archie Comics graphic novel The Chilling Adventures Of Sabrina. It looks like we'll be diving head first into the supernatural aesthetics of Greendale because the entire series will be dropping on Netflix on October 26th - just in time for Halloween.
